segments.text: Doctor , my child is nine years old , and I recently found that he was constantly telling lies about how he is doing at school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is he doing very well at school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He is doing OK , but he pretends he is doing much better by telling lies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This may be complicated . But I think he may need to build up his self-esteem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How can his he do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are a lot of ways to help a kid build up self-esteem , but to begin with , you can try and give him more rewards . Rewards will help a chil improve his self-esteem .
segments.speaker: S1
